name: Custom Portrait (5x7)
description: Custom digital portraits drawn from your favourite photographs! All you have to do is email us your favourite photo of yourself, your family, your kids, your best friend etc and we'll digitally draw and colour it and then mail you the print. The print measures 5 x 7 inches and comes professionally printed on archival grade matte paper. This listing is for a single portrait only. If you have 2 or more people in the photo, please contact us.

name: Pet Portrait (5x7)
description: Custom digital portraits of your beloved pet drawn from your favourite photographs! All you have to do is email us your favourite photo of your pet and we will digitally draw and colour it and then mail you the print. The print measures 5 x 7 inches and comes professionally printed on archival grade matte paper.

name: Custom Car-Toon
description: Transform your ride into a custom drawn Car-Toon! A totally unique and fun gift for any car enthusiast / racing fan / motorhead. All you have to do is email me your favourite photo and I'll digitally draw and color it and then email you the print! And for the ultimate in home decor style, I can also turn your Car-Toon into stunning ready-to-hang wall art including posters, mounted prints, canvas prints, and framed prints. If you are interested please contact me.

name: Avatar for your Blog, Twitter, Facebook Profile
description: Get an awesome custom avatar to use on your Facebook, Twitter, Myspace, Mixi, blogs, forums and more! All you have to do is email me your favourite photo and I will digitally draw and color it. And then when I'm done I will email you your new Avatar all ready to go. Easy at that!
